attributes.action: introduce urgently legislation with fiscal incentives to promote energy saving in ALL domestic, industrial, commercial and national and local governemnt premises.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At a recent meeting of the South Wales Association of the Institution of Civil Engineers (SWA ICE) Retired Engineers Group (REG) the members resolved to petition the PM on the following:
nuclear power, hydro-electric pumped storage, tidal power generation and energy saving legislation.
This is the fourth petition and was supported by 100% of those present.
